summary: During a vacation on an island, two best friends from childhood are haunted by the ghosts of their past.
cast: Mina Tander|Laura de Boer|Lina Köhlert|Mia Kasalo|Greta Oceana Dethlefs|Alina Sophie Antoniadis|William Boer|Katharina Thalbach|Max Riemelt|Thomas Sarbacher|Clemens Schick|Anna Thalbach|Valentin Mereutza|Jessica McIntyre|Tim Kirschstein|Ellenie Salvo González|Dirk Köhlert|Daniela Soko|Rocco Wolf|Rolf Reinecke|Luise Helm|Felix Kreutzmann
title: Du hast es versprochen
